geopolitics.title: India rebalances crude slate as Saudi gains, Russian flows ease under sanctions pressure
geopolitics.description: India’s crude import strategy is shifting towards a gradual rebalancing, with Middle Eastern suppliers, especially Saudi Arabia, regaining market share as Russian imports decline amid sanctions and geopolitical pressures.

geopolitics.title: Trump hikes US global tariff rate to 15 pct
geopolitics.description: President Donald Trump raised the global duty on imports into the United States to 15 percent on Saturday, doubling down on his promise to maintain his aggressive tariff policy a day after the Supreme Court ruled much of it illegal.

geopolitics.title: Hackers Expose Age-Verification Software Powering Surveillance Web
geopolitics.description: Three hacktivists tried to find a workaround to Discord’s age-verification software. Instead, they found its frontend exposed to the open internet.

geopolitics.title: Irish firms ‘risk indirect support for Russia’s war’ as non-sanctioned exports soar, warns Ukrainian embassy
geopolitics.description: Irish companies risk indirectly contributing to Russia’s invasion of Ukraine when exporting to the country, even if their products aren’t affected by EU sanctions, the Ukrainian embassy has warned.

geopolitics.title: Israelis hit Lebanon, leaving 10 dead after air attacks
geopolitics.description: At least 10 people were killed and 50 wounded in Israeli strikes on Lebanon on Friday, security sources said, after Israeli military targeted the area around Baalbek.
